<script data-entry-point="styles_critical_v2_disneyPlus">"use strict";!function(e,o){if("object"==typeof exports&&"object"==typeof module)module.exports=o();else if("function"==typeof define&&define.amd)define([],o);else{var t=o();for(var f in t)("object"==typeof exports?exports:e)[f]=t[f]}}(self,(()=>(self.webpackChunk_solo_marketing=self.webpackChunk_solo_marketing||[]).push([[882],{7738:(e,o,t)=>{t.r(o)}},e=>{var o;return o=7738,e(e.s=o)}])));
//# sourceMappingURL=https://web-map.disneyplus.com/sourcemaps/dominguez-marketing/ce6b785733d212458f6fe59c99ceb7a90bfccf11/styles_critical_v2_disneyPlus.12f73b4e517c4644a038.js.map</script>
<style data-style="override">.hero h2>picture,.hero h2>picture.sm-130,.hero h3>picture.md-130,.hero h3>picture.md-60,h3>picture,h3>picture.md-130,h3>picture.md-60{margin:0 0 -4px 7px;max-width:66px}}@media only screen and (min-width:1025px){.hero h2>picture,.hero <script>
    window.DD_RUM &&
      window.DD_RUM.init({"applicationId":"d90822e2-123b-4b1c-9273-873eed1ba014","clientToken":"pubeb6838009579bd8b524208332c699da6","site":"datadoghq.com","service":"disney-plus-web-marketing","env":"prod","sampleRate":10,"traceSampleRate":10,"trackInteractions":true,"trackResources":true,"trackLongTasks":true,"defaultPrivacyLevel":"mask-user-input","version":"7c2bf81b","allowedTracingUrls":["https://disney.api.edge.bamgrid.com"]});
    window.DD_RUM &&
      window.DD_RUM.startSessionReplayRecording();
  </script>
<script type="text/javascript">
function otLoad() {
    window.Optanon = window.Optanon || {};
}

var otcr = {"url":"https://disney-portal.my.onetrust.com/request/v1/consentreceipts","tokens":["\"eyJhbGciOiJSUzUxMiJ9..OcSDK-4Qh96tN0wShOyMJsYgqb9ytszvYoiTwoYv4-eRUes3iYpkWNej9Vbek0cie8bjswFYAQaKvJFXFtn0U63mYYvvP8QCnl5sYI1py5bXqx6RQMLsvnmXTUqZOHTfIdHJprpunt8fe3LmhgL2h8h4_xAK--9wjnfhFT-CbN8Rka89kj5DUiGVOAz_OwHIDLrZ4ryyrTXyEzao9BFx0-L-NKLd0PmnYylILzgjd6_oShLmD4QmywIgLznsBmybNACryRw-e69DmvPLPyFQZcTggM2Cr5WG0IiYGaGMXw4oW3qu9_I7e2ZE4iQUU1P9YNXDdxXFfJFW8vMjEt_lTt0oRxxU8iJaztJ7Ollqs8ivImXW2snjvxJYRZrs_ruka28uafNNPjzmoFFfRcQehHJjvmGy2HF7KefYaSwNMDN0eHwdNuRkl1Th6-e4JsRjEhXWHhV1RV7AJme6tBwjNAC497MBYOq5woj7nwRe63MKM8k-idXqX7xa3TbqF82Z4o7wfT391_0ZzFZG3VSGb-3-paGOf_kQzaoBvFAcTIISg9xWan3EiGIigf8u5xduatsR84nMANqtddots0QYx8Yt-1ns9IombTcgil2GAC4KBIq-7STEihpRTEikIeF3ddPoUHJnKfehARDUBq0K0T56Q1WtP5OBDrXdS_8rb40\"","\"eyJhbGciOiJSUzUxMiJ9..QKJInM--yh0axg0eFaXN6QDtZDg4B2OrD27KXL9kuay4UfYaz6AqNbLQ2XCbGAepYm-Ih87mGYLbICifV2kBHKQyuB8c32kK1No11qm9xWrgMx2_txCqNHPEOE5eloYsdC0WIPsITcoui86MTqQDIjpZnuU-hIl-kK_afE23XVG3_wDyY7aSNdsWPsFIQv-fq4HmQzqyyMhHvYZGP72ZkX9YQBHgYpegLsU-w_jCxMiH92qTKK557pAsVZKIdcGKyXyaijeiIXWc8VmQBYWBU_jbj-vP6-hBcCFTkGuPfknYSyDmczsN_d5KG7UHgehnY5SJT09MZ-WuuMoMM1jRFx3sKoU2X2pMVImig_jip1yW_F6H1SlgdNxebnxsKy1txRcR4RI-svYMI9LsQzCMFYG0xUdHy8KVw3oj37gptgFUcp7o-xIxYDJizgApmpR-eB7wWbo7VHX_bawAjhMhl70Dcq2SCTQrQYihs1CPEoWLuyFPaVu_oIkuV8AzPR_0ysUIvIfbMoACqfmBihHPbSkkYZCKpXblRxWVGVpeggAoP7VbXNI6xPcel9LDes9NQ7WGZmX3oSVYLm3UGitM3p3sFLGupKzNk2DdveW5DnDmuoAZlLErIwQVzQS7qq2qFcaU3Ra1KWJffoD26-MgnXuehute4p_wSRqtE4SdSx4\""],"purposes":["\"d82c2c85-df51-4db2-ad3b-6bcd8a73b81d\"","\"9d9dffe3-3c38-452a-9eb6-567ca26c18ef\"","\"06d6e70e-4f0c-44bb-b180-b69eae273778\""]};

var OneTrust = {
    geolocationResponse: {
        countryCode: 'US'
    },
    src: 'https://cdn.cookielaw.org/scripttemplates/otSDKStub.js',
    guuid: '796524c5-24c2-4cdf-907c-573192ba6a9d',
    loaded: false
};

function OptanonWrapper() {
    if(!window.OneTrustConsent) {
        Optanon.InsertScript("https://prod-static.disney-plus.net/eu-west-1/disneyPlus/app/build/disneyPlus/app/scripts/oneTrustConsentBundle.d87f7567c8.js", 'head', null, null, '1');
    }

    if (!window.OptanonWrapperFunctions) {
        window.OptanonWrapperFunctions = [];
    }

    if (window.OptanonWrapperFunctions.length) {
        window.OptanonWrapperFunctions.forEach(function(f) {
            f();
        });
    }
}
</script>
</head>

controls.</p></li><li><p>An ever-growing range of titles in stunning 4K UHD and Dolby Atmos sound on compatible devices.</p></li><li><p>Stream on up to four devices at the same data-gv2-index="5" data-gv2-key="section" id="devices"><h2>Available on your favorite devices<br/></h2><p class="text-medium"></p><ul class="grid-list four-column mobile-two-column middle"><li devices<br/>AppleTV<br/>Chromecast<br/>LG TV<br/>Roku<br/>Samsung<br/>Xfinity X1 &amp; Flex<br/>Hisense <br/>Panasonic</p></li><li class="grid-item center"><picture class="device"><source One<br/>Xbox Series X<br/>Xbox Series S</p></li></ul></section><section class="center" data-analytics-section="body:Section - Accordion - FAQs - US OLP - 6 Items - 12/08/22:6" data-gv2-element="container" data-gv2-index="6" data-gv2-key="mlp_faq_module" data-gv2-type="menu_list"><h2>Frequently Asked Questions</h2><div class="accordion-container"><button class="accordion-btn h5" data-analytics="click" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="expand_collapse" data-gv2-type="button"><span>What is Disney+?</span></button><div class="accordion-child"><p><span class="medium">Disney+ is the streaming home of Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographic, and more. From new releases to your favorite classics and exclusive Originals, there's something for everyone.</span></p></div></div><div class="accordion-container"><button class="accordion-btn h5" data-analytics="click" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="expand_collapse" data-gv2-type="button"><span>How much does Disney+ cost?</span></button><div class="accordion-child"><p><span class="medium">Access unlimited entertainment with Disney+ Basic or Disney+ Premium:</span></p><ul><li><p><span class="medium">Disney+ Basic: Disney+ (With Ads) for the price of $7.99/month</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Disney+ Premium: Disney+ (No Ads) for the price of $10.99/month or $109.99/year</span></p></li></ul><p><span class="medium">Save over 16%* on </span><span class="medium"><a class="link" data-analytics="click" data-analytics-name="Link - Disney+ Premium (No Ads)" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="standalone_annual_cta" data-gv2-type="button" data-testid="standalone_annual_cta_section" href="/sign-up?skuInterval=annual&amp;toggle=shown"><span>Disney+ Premium (No Ads)</span></a></span><span class="medium"> with an annual plan for $109.99/year</span><i><span class="medium"> </span></i><br/><span class="fine">*Savings compared to 12 months of the monthly price of Disney+ Premium (No Ads).</span></p></div></div><div class="accordion-container"><button class="accordion-btn h5" data-analytics="click" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="expand_collapse" data-gv2-type="button"><span>What can I watch on Disney+?</span></button><div class="accordion-child"><p><span class="medium">With Disney+, you can choose from an always-growing collection of stories.</span></p><p></p><ul><li><p><span class="medium">New releases and timeless classics</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Exclusive new Original Movies and Series</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Exciting specials and limited-time streaming events</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Nostalgic throwbacks and past seasons of your favorite shows</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">The entire Skywalker Saga and much of the Marvel Cinematic Universe</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Beloved and experimental shorts</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Documentaries, unscripted series, and so much more</span></p></li></ul></div></div><div class="accordion-container"><button class="accordion-btn h5" data-analytics="click" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="expand_collapse" data-gv2-type="button"><span>Where can I watch Disney+?</span></button><div class="accordion-child"><p><span class="medium">The Disney+ app is available on mobile devices, web browsers, game consoles, set-top boxes, and smart TVs. For a complete list of supported devices, click </span><span class="medium"><a class="link" data-analytics="click" data-analytics-name="Link - Click Here - FAQ Supported Devices List" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="mlp_link" data-gv2-type="button" data-testid="mlp_link_section" href="https://help.disneyplus.com/csp?id=csp_article_content&amp;sys_kb_id=eac89167db3048900a2af56e0f96193b"><span>here</span></a></span><span class="medium">.</span></p></div></div><div class="accordion-container"><button class="accordion-btn h5" data-analytics="click" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="expand_collapse" data-gv2-type="button"><span>What's included on the Disney+ plans with and without ads?</span></button><div class="accordion-child"><p><span class="medium">You can now get the following plans with Disney+ and choose your streaming experience: </span><br/></p><p><span class="medium">Disney+ Basic: Disney+ (With Ads) for $7.99/month</span></p><ul><li><p><span class="medium">Thousands of award-winning classics and Originals</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">The ability to watch on four screens at once at no extra cost</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Over 300 titles in 4K UHD and HDR</span></p></li></ul><p></p><p><span class="medium">Disney+ Premium: Disney+ (No Ads) for $10.99/month or $109.99/year</span></p><ul><li><p><span class="medium">Thousands of award-winning classics and Originals</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">The ability to watch on four screens at once at no extra cost</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Over 300 titles in 4K UHD and HDR</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Unlimited downloads on up to 10 devices</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Groupwatch</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Dolby Atmos</span></p></li></ul></div></div><div class="accordion-container"><button class="accordion-btn h5" data-analytics="click" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="expand_collapse" data-gv2-type="button"><span>What is the Disney Bundle?</span></button><div class="accordion-child"><p><span class="medium">Disney Bundle plans include subscriptions to either Disney+ and Hulu, or Disney+, Hulu, and ESPN+, at discounted prices, as compared to the retail price of each subscription when purchased separately.</span></p><p><span class="medium">Choose between the following Disney Bundle plans:</span></p><p></p><ul><li><p><span class="medium">Disney Bundle Duo Basic for $9.99/month, which includes Disney+ (With Ads) and Hulu (With Ads) </span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Disney Bundle Trio Basic for $12.99/month, which includes Disney+ (With Ads), Hulu (With Ads), and ESPN+ (With Ads) </span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Disney Bundle Trio Premium for $19.99/month, which includes Disney+ (No Ads), Hulu (No Ads), and ESPN+ (With Ads) </span></p></li></ul><p></p><p><span class="medium">With Disney+, you get new releases, classics, series, and Originals from the creators at Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and Nat Geo. </span><br/></p><p><span class="medium">With Hulu, you can enjoy current hits, comfort classics, award-winning originals, and movies everyone is talking about. </span></p><p></p><p><span class="medium">And with ESPN+, you can stream live sports, thousands of live events, top leagues and tournaments, ESPN+ Originals, and the complete 30 for 30 Library. Plus, get exclusive access to premium articles, fantasy tools, and archives.</span></p><p></p><p><span class="medium">Get </span><span class="medium"><a class="link" data-analytics="click" data-testid="mlp_link_section" href="/welcome/disney-hulu-espn-bundle"><span>Disney Bundle</span></a></span><span class="medium"> and start streaming now!</span></p></div></div></section></main><footer aria-label="Main Footer" data-analytics-section="footer:null:null" data-gv2-element="container" data-gv2-key="footer" data-gv2-type="footer"
